DUBLIN, Feb. 3, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/2wkdwl/global_fuel_cell ) has announced the addition of the "Global Fuel Cell Market in the Automotive Industry 2015-2019" report to their offering. The global fuel cell market in the automotive industry to grow at a CAGR of 45.27% during the period 2016-2020. The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global fuel cell market in the automotive industry for 2015-2019.
